name: Princess Lewis
text: I love the Garlic butter crust..it's the perfect tastey crunch that no other place can match. Its also very reasonably priced for a personal 10 piece pizza.

name: Michael Whitt
text: My first time ordering from Hungry Howies, here is a photo of how my $25 pie came, pretty sad. I asked the driver for napkins and he said he didnt bring any....atleast the pizza tastes ok. I doubt that I will order from them again.

name: Sharon McNeill
text: I order the 2 mix and match deal. I got 2 Greek salads one of them is suppose to have no black olives, no peppercorns, extra feta cheese. The other one was supposed to no black olives, no peppercorns, extra feta cheese, extra cucumbers, ‚Ä¶More

text: Waited over 2 hours only for the delivery driver needing me to walk across my apartment complex to pick up a cold pizza. BUT WAIT!!! hungry howies is getting doordash to do their deliveries so they're not responsible for the delivery times. ‚Ä¶More

name: JD 704

text: Man this pizza was everything! My daughter had to work an need something quick an good! The lady answered the phone was very helpful and helped me out. Thank you! An the food was fresh! Thank you i will be back!!

name: Stephen McAbee
text: Normally I love their pizza. But this time the crust was a little hard. But over all great pizza!! Flavored crust is very good.

name: Nathan Hewitt
text: Delicious and less expensive than a good frozen pizza with their two for $6 each deal. I get points when I order online. My food is always hit and ready on time. Many a family dinners have been saved by Hungry Howie's.

name: Craig 701
text: Brought a large chicken & bacon sandwich three times and on the 3rd time there was hardly any chicken or bacon however there was lots of onions & cheese,  very disappointed since the first two were worth every bit of the $9.19.

name: Lucia McClain
text: We used to eat here often but ever since we started this keto diet, we haven't been in a while. But I had a late night pizza craving tonight. This location is open late on Fridays. The food is always fresh and cooked quickly. The manager is ‚Ä¶More

name: Lvcif3r
text: - Order 00608. Paid $58 for a smashed pizza, and made the mistake of tipping the driver. Had to drive to the location in the rain to get a new pizza. I swear they put some bodily fluids on the new one. Its soggy in the middle and taste like spit to me. Screw this place. -

text: Family take out pizza chain, kids love this stuff.

text: Neil had excellent customer service...Attitude was great...Pizza was delicious..ran in & ran right back out with my pizza..

name: Cynt Brown
text: I truly love hungry howie's until they mess up my order. I can not stand olives, especially on my pizza and salad. Why do i have all these damn olives on my salad when i clearly said NO OLIVES and lite bell peppers. OMG!!!!!!

text: My girlfriend and I have been here at least ten times and every time has been a great experience. Friendly staff, food ready on time and tastes great. Best pizza place we've been to by far!

text: BEST pizza in town , Cajun crust is my fav!!!

text: The staff was very inexperienced there tonight, saw them mess up order after order while I was waiting on my order they messed up. 20 min after the guy told me they had it figured out I went back to the counter to ask if my order was ready ‚Ä¶More

name: Robert Leo
text: Its spongy dough but it's a decent pizza.  Wings are like slow cooked so they're soft, dont need as much sauce on wings. I order and Mom and daughter love this style. Decent pizza for family.

name: Asa Holloway
text: Stopped in late night and the food is prepared fresh and hot was greeted with a warm welcome from the gentleman behind the counter did a great job surprisingly delicious

name: Becca
text: I go to this pizza place from time to time. It is a clean facility and the people are friendly. The gentleman behind the counter took my order promptly and I waited for about 15 minutes for a medium pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: Joshua Brown
text: Usually have good experiences with Howies, however this location took 2.5 hours to arrive and obviously was very cold.  Kept calling the store for updates after 1.5 hours and they had no clue when it would be arriving.  Avoid this location if you can.  Have had good experiences with other locations.

text: around 8:40pm I ordered the pizza from this place which was about 3.2 miles away from where I live and it didn't take them a long time at all for it to get to me. The person who made the delivery had a very vibrant attitude and the food was just awesome (as usual). Thanks guys!

text: I came and got a calzone and some Howie bread.  The food was prepared very well and tasted great!  The guy who took my order was very nice and professional.  I will have to admit that I didn't expect that.  I just assumed that they were a ‚Ä¶More

text: Awful experience twice in a row. 2 hours for delivery, then a stupid mistake on a cold pizza. Wouldn't mind as much if I wasn't hung up on mid sentence when explaining the problems. Gave them a second chance, then they messed that up too.

text: So not cool. Waited an hour and a half for my order. Call the store and got no answer. Come to find out they canceled my order and didn't bother to even give me a call. Never ordering for here again.

text: I recently ordered a large meat eaters and a coke from this location. I was told the pizza would take 10min got there a little early and it was ready to go.William H. was very nice and welcoming to me and my friend. Will visit again.
